name: New RTS - early version, one faction, should be bug free
name_original: New RTS - early version, one faction, should be bug free
description:
A top-down 3d RTS with no fog of war. Currently only one faction, map, and mode, but everything else is completed and should be bug free.

Watch the tutorial video in the main menu, or pause (esc, pause, or spacebar) and check out the controls and info section.

Questions, comments, and constructive criticism much appreciated!
